review_data.title: Asian all the way!

review_data.title: nice food, average but slow service

review_data.title: Avoid the Sushi, go for the soups
review_data.content: Nicely located in a food court so several options for everyone. However avoid the sushi for sure, but soups are very nice - both the Miso and the Vietnamese

review_data.title: Good value for money
review_data.content: Good déco and prices for the dishes served. It is a very popular place with the locals. The schezuan beef was average, mainly due to the use of frozen carrots.

review_data.title: Лучше место для еды в аэропорту Цюриха.

review_data.title: Grocery store sushi
review_data.content: Service was friendly. But the sushi we ordered clearly was stale and brought from a ready made grocery store counter - it wasn't freshly prepared at the restaurant. Aggh..

review_data.title: Best restaurant in the airport!
review_data.content: This is by far the best restaurant in the airport when taking in to account the price as well. I had the spicy green curry with pork, and this was so good. To accompany this I had a beer and their homemade ice tea, the...More

review_data.title: Excellent for an airport restaurant
review_data.content: Came here at lunchtime on Friday - it was not too busy, and perfectly located in the check in area. The staff were friendly and spoke very good english. We had a lovely selection of Dim Sum to start, then i would highly recommend the...More

review_data.title: Quick and good
review_data.content: If you're in a hurry but you're sick of having sandwiches on the go, well this may strike the right balance between a decent but quick meal. If you go for the daily suggestions you can be in and out in 30 minutes. The food...More

review_data.title: Good Asia Rest before Departure
review_data.content: I'm coming to this restaurant often before flying from zürich. Really tasty Asian food and very friendly staff. Very fast in serving and constant quality. Bit pricey, but it's an airport restaurant.

review_data.title: Good for an Airport Restaurant
review_data.content: Generally speaking, airport restaurants aren't wonderful. However, this place was very good for airport food. They had sushi, noodle bowls, and many other options. Plenty to choose from and we all enjoyed our meals. They also had a dinner special while we were there -...More

review_data.title: Gutes Essen, gutes Ambiente

review_data.title: Great food
review_data.content: Every time I go through Zurich airport I try to stop at this restaurant. It is not cheap, but it is always excellent. I highly recommend this to everyone who loves good Asian cooking.

review_data.title: Impressed!
